articles.author: Giedre Peseckyte
articles.title: Teen’s murder drives Albania to ban TikTok for a year - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Prime Minister Edi Rama blamed the Chinese-owned platform for inciting violence after a schoolboy was stabbed to death.
articles.content:
The problem today is not our children, the problem today is us, the problem today is our society, the problem today is TikTok and all the others that are taking our children hostage, Rama said.
TikT… [+1015 chars]
